action.description: The committee on PBS recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 7 Ayes: Representative(s) Belatti, Hashem, Lamosao, Poepoe, Shimizu, Souza; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) Iwamoto;  Noes: none; and 3 Excused: Representative(s) Ichiyama, Morikawa, Woodson.
